Package de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages

Interface Summary
Language Base interface for all languages, which is used to create scanners and parsers for a specific language.
LanguageParser Interface to parsers for a given language, that are used in conjunction with the language scanners to transform the source code for a given language to an expression tree.
LanguageScanner Base interface for scanners for the various languages, which are used to translate the source code for a given language to a token stream that is afterwards processed by the LanguageParser to generate the expression tree.
LanguageTranslator Base interface for translators that are used to translate expressions to core syntax for a given language.
LanguageTypeParser Interface to type parser for a given language, that are used in conjunction with the language scanners to parse types from their string representations to a Type hierarchy, which is used in the type checker user interface to enter the type for an expression directly.
LanguageTypeScanner Base interface for type scanners for the various languages, which are used in conjunction with the LanguageTypeParsers to translate the string representation of monomorphic types to MonoType hierarchies, in a way similar to the LanguageScanner, which is used to tokenize the string representation of expressions.
 

Class Summary
AbstractLanguage Abstract base class for classes that implement the Language interface.
AbstractLanguageScanner Abstract base class for classes that implement the LanguageScanner interface.
AbstractLanguageTranslator Abstract base class for implementations of the LanguageTranslator interface, which provides default implementations of the required methods, that may need to be overwritten by derived classes with concrete implementations.
AbstractLanguageTypeScanner Abstract base class for classes that implement the LanguageTypeScanner interface.
LanguageFactory Factory class for Languages.
LanguageSymbol Instances of this class represent symbols that will be returned from the LanguageScanners.
 

Exception Summary
LanguageParserException This exception is thrown whenever a parse error occurs in the languages.LanguageParser.
LanguageScannerException Thrown if an error occurs while scanning the source code for a given language.
NoSuchLanguageException Thrown if the LanguageFactory cannot find the Language implementation for a given language id.
